snippet: A gut-renovated Greek Revival-style townhouse is about to enter the market at $14.95 million.
abstract: Fancifully renovated Greek Revival-style Greenwich Village townhouse, part of historic enclave of eight brick homes built on a serene stretch of Waverly Place in 1839, is about to enter the market at $14.95 million.
lead_paragraph: A gut-renovated Greek Revival-style townhouse is about to enter the market at $14.95 million.

headline.main: Greenwich Village: No Dowel Left Unturned
